# Phase 2 EZ899-231558: Replacement Fire Alarm System 

## Tender Details

* [Reference Number] WS3919683798-Doc3953200141
* [Amendment Number] 11
* [Solicitation Number] WS3919683798
* [Publication Date] 2023-04-05
* [Tender Closing Date] 2023-06-15T14:00:00
* [Amendment Date] 2023-06-13

## Service Overview

This tender is for the replacement of an existing fire alarm system at a maximum security institution. The work involves:

* Replacement of the existing fire alarm system across multiple buildings
* Conversion of inmate cells from smoke detection systems to aspirating smoke detection systems
* Installation of a fibre-optic backbone network for the fire alarm system
* Modifications to sprinkler valves in two inmate living units
* Conversion of two rooms from standard sprinkler protection to pre-action sprinkler protection
* Miscellaneous non-electrical and mechanical items of work, including drywall and painting
